xxl.core.relational.metaData
Class ColumnMetaDatas

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.relational.metaData.ColumnMetaDatas

public class ColumnMetaDatas
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides static methods for dealing with instances implementing the interface column metadata. Beside this methods, it contains constants for identifying columns storing data that is rather important for query processing and optimization.

See Also:
ColumnMetaData

Field Detail

COLUMN_METADATA_COMPARATOR

public static final java.util.Comparator<ColumnMetaData> COLUMN_METADATA_COMPARATOR
This constant provides a comparator for metadata of a single column in a result set. The given column metadata is compared for the column names, the column types and a possible loss of precision.

COLUMN_METADATA_HASH_FUNCTION

public static final Function<ColumnMetaData,java.lang.Integer> COLUMN_METADATA_HASH_FUNCTION
This constant provides a hash function for metadata of a single column in a result set. The hash-code of a given column metadata is defined as the sum of the hash-code of the column name, the column type and a the precision.

COLUMN_METADATA_TYPE

public static final java.lang.String COLUMN_METADATA_TYPE
This constant can be used to identify column metadata inside a composite metadata.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getColumnMetaData

public static ColumnMetaData getColumnMetaData(MetaDataProvider<? extends CompositeMetaData<? super java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object>> metaDataProvider)
                                        throws MetaDataException
Returns the metadata fragment of the given metadata provider's metadata representing its column metadata.

Parameters:
metaDataProvider - the metadata provider containing the desired column metadata fragment.
Returns:
the column metadata fragment of the given metadata provider's metadata.
Throws:
MetaDataException - when the given metadata provider's metadata does not contain any column metadata fragment.
